nodes.text: Tegris Ordo was a Mandalorian warrior who served as the chieftain of Clan Ordo during the tumultuous period of time known as the Mandalorian Wars, a bloody conflict between the Mandalorians and the dominant political body in the galaxy at the time, the Galactic Republic. After the end of the wars and the death of Tegris, Clan Ordo was left without a leader and subsequently became scattered.
Tegris Ordo was first mentioned in the 2011 novel, The Old Republic: Revan by author Drew Karpyshyn.
